item.description:
Few are making the case that is rather obvious to us that reckless spending, political corruption, and the fantasy perpetuated by President Obama and other members of the political ruling class that there should be no limits to our desires, is harming the psychology of the nation. We are becoming a nation of irresponsible, entitled narcissists detached from reality. Our children are suffering the most.

In this fishbowl conversation, our panel will first try to talk about the problem in a way that is seldom heard in contemporary discourse. At the same time we will seek solutions. Common sense must prevail over the damage being done to us by the ruling oligarchy in Washington.

 

http://www.meetup.com/Seacoast-Common-Sense-Community-Builders/events/99043032/
item.name: Common Sense Tuesday event at PPMTV
